quote: To design is to communicate clearly by whatever means you can control or master.
author: Milton Glaser

quote: Content is fire, social media is gasoline.
author: Jay Baer

quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Good marketing makes the company look smart. Great marketing makes the customer feel smart.
author: Joe Chernov

quote: The web does not just connect machines, it connects people.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: The best websites are not built overnight; they evolve over time.
author: Unknown

quote: Web development is all about turning beautifully designed web pages into interactive and functional websites.
author: Unknown

quote: The best marketing doesn't feel like marketing.
author: Tom Fishburne

quote: Marketing is telling the world you're a rock star. Content marketing is showing the world you are one.
author: Robert Rose

quote: The future of the web is mobile, and that's where the opportunities are.
author: Eric Schmidt

quote: Graphic design will save the world right after rock and roll does.
author: David Carson

quote: In the world of Internet Customer Service, it's important to remember your competitor is only one mouse click away.
author: Doug Warner
